DataElement.preferredName: Disseminate Or Extrapulmonary Coccidioidomycosis Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No Indicator of whether disseminate or extrapulmonary coccidioidomycosis is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To scatter widely; spread._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Outside of or excluding the lungs._A fungal infection caused by Coccidioides immitis. Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Outside of or excluding the lungs.

A fungal infection caused by Coccidioides immitis. Affected individuals usually have mild flu-like symptoms. However, pneumonia and systemic involvement with the formation of abscesses may develop as complications of the disease.
